item.title: Blockchain's Backers Set to Improve its Image, Form Muskoka Group
item.description:
Blockchain's Backers Set to Improve its Image, Form Muskoka Group

Is Blockchain ready to sex it up? A three-day conference held at the Lake of Bays in Muskoka Canada which involved Blockchain advocates, theorists and policy experts was held between August 24th-26th, 2016. The meeting participants explored ways that the Blockchain can achieve its fullest potential.

item.title: KIBO: Creating the World's First Blockchain Lottery
item.description:
KIBO: Creating the World's First Blockchain Lottery

KIBO Disclaimer: This article was sponsored by KIBO. Bitcoinist is not responsible for this firm's products and/or services. , the first ever blockchain and Ethereum smart-contract based lottery, is announcing the launch of an ICO to raise funding for the completion and launch of its platform, which it calls a "revolution in online lotto."

item.title: What Is The Future Of Bitcoin?
item.description:
What Is The Future Of Bitcoin?

Digital payment platform Bitcoin began in 2008 as a secure cryptocurrency, and it has evolved into a valuable digital exchange system. Digital payment platform Bitcoin began in 2008 as a secure cryptocurrency, and it has evolved into a valuable digital exchange system.

item.title: Kimberley Process Inches Closer to 'Blood Diamond' Blockchain - CoinDesk
item.description:
Kimberley Process Inches Closer to 'Blood Diamond' Blockchain - CoinDesk

A new report from the chair of the Kimberley Process - an initiative aimed at keeping conflict diamonds out of the global precious stones market - indicates that the UN-backed scheme is moving forward with its blockchain work.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Intrarange Back On! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Intrarange Back On! - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this evening. We said this morning that the bitcoin price had been pretty frustrating from an intraday perspective over the last few weeks, and that we hoped this would change as we headed into the close of this one.

item.title: Bank Of Canada Paper Explores Factors Behind Bitcoin Volatility
item.description:
Bank Of Canada Paper Explores Factors Behind Bitcoin Volatility

As virtual currencies like bitcoin become more established, the exchange rate will be less affected by speculator perceptions, according to a staff working paper [PDF] on the value of virtual currencies written for the Bank of Canada by Wilko Bolt of the Netherlands Bank and Maarten R.C.

item.title: Whiteford Research
item.description:
Whiteford Research

Whiteford Research supplies electronics kits and components for hobbyist and research purposes.

item.title: Blockchain Surveillance is Accelerating Privacy Tool Development
item.description:
Blockchain Surveillance is Accelerating Privacy Tool Development

Over the past couple of months privacy-centric solutions have been growing in importance and popularity for the nascent cryptocurrency industry. Also read: Monero Rising: Why Dark Markets Matter When it comes to cryptocurrencies one treasured goal is the ability to remain private, which requires both an anonymous and fungible currency.

item.title: What is the risk of selling bitcoin and accepting credit card payment?
item.description:
What is the risk of selling bitcoin and accepting credit card payment?

Answer: Yes, the credit card user can dispute the charge up to 120 days after receiving the statement that includes the transaction. Bitcoin is digital cash and charges are irreversible. This is by design and one of bitcoin's greatest strengths, but it is also an obstacle to adoption as people ar...

item.title: Microsoft Smart Contracts: a working group to improve security | HolyTransaction
item.description:
Microsoft Smart Contracts: a working group to improve security | HolyTransaction

Today the tech giant announced it is working on a project to improve Microsoft smart contracts security. Called Kinakuta , this working group aims at making it easier for companies to use and develop smart contracts based on the blockchain.
